main event: On May 2, 1957, a UFO was reported at Edwards AFB, California, featuring a metallic disk-shaped object that was tracked for approximately 25 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred around 0500 L and lasted 25 minutes, witnesses described the object as aluminum or metallic with a translucent glow, The object was confirmed to be a balloon according to the comments provided in the report, One UFO analysis report suggested that the tracking instruments provided misleading data, The analysis emphasized that the observers may have misestimated the objectâ€™s size and distance.
sighted object: one aluminum or metallic disk shaped object
witness description: Civilian instrument mechanics and operators from Lancaster, California.
